The canyon is in Wollemi National Park, you can view alerts here: https://www.nationalparks.nsw.gov.au/visit-a-park/parks/wollemi-national-park/local-alerts

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

  • YouTube.com : Richard Pattison, Lower Wolgan Canyons movie. Inverse Canyon at 1:48.


https://sleepwhenwearedead.net/2020/11/16/journey-to-dick-rock/

Background

The first visit, Nov 1974 by a NPA group, 1-3 Nov 74, consisting of Ted Daniels, Tom Williams, Tom Sinclair, David Kelly, Vince Murtagh, Joe Mack, John Alexander, Alex Preema and David Noble. They went up the creek from the bottom - hence the name.

  • David Noble : Wolgan Walk - 1974
  • David Noble : South Wolgan Exploratory Canyoning - Part 1 (1974 - 76)

Published by David Noble in his "Wolgan Canyons Sketch Map" of 1988.
